p:
In the Mawathahena control area, both the total mosquito count and the Ae. albopictus mosquito count were significantly correlated positively with Rainfall
t−0 , Rainy days
t−0 , Minimum RH
t−0 , Wind speed
t−2 and Wind speed
t−3 and significant negative correlations were observed with the Rainfall
t−3 , Rainy days
t−3 , Maximum RH
t−2 and Maximum RH
t−3 . When considering the correlations with Ae. aegypti mosquito counts, significantly negative correlations were observed with Minimum temperature
t−2 and Wind speed
t−0 .
